name: <&fs::File as io::Seek>::stream_len

core::option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 3880, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 4389, name: "core::result::Result" }), GenericArgs([Type(Ty { id: 553, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U64)) }), Type(Ty { id: 20, kind: RigidTy(Adt(AdtDef(DefId { id: 4564, name: "io::error::Error" }), GenericArgs([]))) })]))) })])

doc:
Returns the length of this file (in bytes).

 See [`Seek::stream_len`] docs for more info.

 # Platform-specific behavior

 This function currently corresponds to the `statx` function on Linux
 (with fallbacks) and the `GetFileSizeEx` function on Windows. Note that
 this [may change in the future][changes].

 [changes]: io#platform-specific-behavior
